---
title: "Dashboard of Instacart Data Exploration"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
data(instacart)
instacart_ploty = 
  instacart |> 
  select(order_id, product_id,user_id,order_dow, order_hour_of_day, days_since_prior_order, aisle, department)|>
    drop_na() |> 
    sample_n(13000)
```
Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A. Order Distribution by Day of the Week and Department

```{r}
instacart_ploty |> 
  mutate(order_dow = factor(order_dow, 
                            levels = 0:6, 
                            labels = c("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday"))) |> 
  group_by(order_dow,department) |> 
  summarise(order_amount = n()) |> 
  plot_ly( x = ~order_dow, y = ~order_amount, color = ~department, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")|> 
layout(xaxis = list(title = "Day of the Week"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Order Amount"),
    barmode = "stack"
  )
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B. Average Weekly Products Ordered by Hour of the Day

```{r}
instacart_ploty |> 
  group_by(department, order_hour_of_day) |> 
  summarise(order_amount = n()/7)|> 
plot_ly(x = ~order_hour_of_day, y = ~order_amount, color = ~department, type = "scatter", mode = "lines+markers", colors = "viridis")|> 
  layout(xaxis = list(title = "Hour of the Day"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Average Weekly Orders per Hour"))
```

### Chart C. Distribution of Days Since Prior Order by Department

```{r}
instacart_ploty |> 
    mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, days_since_prior_order)) |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~department,  y = ~days_since_prior_order, type = "box", color = ~department , colors = "viridis" ) |>
  layout(xaxis = list(title = "Department"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Days Since Prior Order")
  )
```
